fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Log in with AWS account
2. Click "Launch new instance" button
3. Click the (x) for ownerid:amazon facet
4. Notice image list takes a long time to load and, even if it loads the browser is non-responsive and eventually will lock up.

Tested in Safari 6, FF 24, and Chrome 30 on Mac OS 10.8
fields.summary: Removing ownerid:amazon facet in Create Instance wizard locks up browser (will need fixing in create launch config wizard too)

comments.body: Clearing the ownerid:amazon facet engages a load of the full image set. This operation needs a progress indicator.
This is bad as well.
this will also hose the create launch config wizard, should be fixed there too

This is in the image wizard step (views/shared/images.*)
This is the thing that uses a scrolling list to show all images. It used to use datatable which had paging. As Ean and I discussed on IRC a day or two ago, this will fall down and is barely usable with the amazon images. It either needs paging or infinite scroll which would re-use divs. Opening a scrolling window with 20K divs is certainly going to take a crap. We only discovered this "this" week and figured there wasn't time with the other stuff we had going on. Sorry it wasn't documented till now.

So should this be targeted for 3.4.1? Please update the fix version in that
case.
On Oct 10, 2013 5:08 PM, "David Kavanagh (JIRA)" <
if this does not work in AWS, which it doesn't, we should fix in 3.4, IMHO.

Update: scrolling is working well and browser does not lock up. Small issues remaining to get everything working right before merging (continuing to check branch for regressions):

Selection does not work yet

i get a validation error immediately, should not until on click on next button

does not seem to work from dash, only from images landing (check from instance landing too)

needs to work in launch config wizard

needs loading animation (and loading animation should know when array is empty): this may have just been merged in to 7828 branch

Be sure everything is still kosher when merged with 7836

Instance wizard when launched form image landing does not auto select image like it should. image should be selected and wizard should start at next step.

I should only see AMI in image list in wizards. I am seeing ARI as well (not sure if also AKI)

Images in image list in launch instance wizard are all showing Linux icon in AWS, not actual flavor icons. Flavor icons show correctly in summary. Neither displaying correctly in launch config wizard.

I can select an image from the list but the one shown in summary is not the one I clicked, and the one I clicked does not indicate visually that it has been selected in the list (needs correct class applied)

Be sure launch instance wizard works and instance gets launched as part of regression testing please when all these are fixed.
Manage tags dialog does not display for images.
I'll take selection and platform images.
manage tags is broken in testing. i'll file a separate bug for that

I'm seeing this (which I saw on testing) on EUCA-7828 when I go from the dashboard to the images page. Then, part way through, I move back to the dashboard. You'll notice it starts trying to fetch amazonimages every second and keeps it up after moving away from that landing page. Best I can tell, this is because search is being poked each time. I'll try to get to the bottom of that. I'm seeing it worse on the branch Jerry just merged into EUCA-7828 when I use the newinstances wizard. The describe calls are a LOT more frequent. Before EUCA-7828 gets merged, we need to address this so the proxy doesn't get banged on so much.

selection and flavor looks fixed in 7828 branch now thanks [~jpommer].
Update: wizard launchable from all launch points.

Things still needing fixing:

1) need to filter list to only AMI in wizards (launch instance and create launch config)
2) launching either wizard from image landing and not having the image already selected, showing in summary and wizard on second step.
3) the thing David mentioned above that he is working on.
I believe the above issue to be fixed now. Pushed code to branch.
[~dkavanagh]yay! the third one? Can you start on one of the others?
Verified the third issue is fixed. However, [~jpommer]'s push of the working indicator on the wizard pages is not there in 7828. Can someone figure that out please?
First two issues are fixed in 7828 branch. Instances are extremely slow to update in instance table now, but the issues are fixed.

I manually tested this one today with [~jloza], and I ran the automated tests after merging testing into the 7828 branch and it seems solid, so I merged https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus-console/pull/149

[~kgill] [~jloza]

What is the expected behavior now?

Hi [~viglesias], the launch instance and create launch config (autoscaling) wizards now both have infinite scroll image selector lists, and do not cause your browser to freeze up when trying to load images from amazon.
No longer seeing this in Chrome.
